name: 苏珊娜·巴列斯特罗斯
name_full: 苏珊娜·巴列斯特罗斯 Susana Ballesteros
introduction: Susana Ballesteros is a bilingual voice actress and singer. Playing with the textures and resonances of the voice always fascinated her and at a very young age she discovered her passion for studio recording and animation. Her singing voice can also be heard in the Spanish version of several Disney, Netflix or Hasbro's cartoons. She combines voice acting with on camera TV reporting. In the past, she worked as the host of two classical music radio shows. She has a journalism degree, postgraduate on economic journalism, masters degree on radio and is a trained classical violinist. She is a SAG-AFTRA voice actress and also owns an entertainment news agency in Los Angeles.
